name: Amazing! Click to find out more!
name_original: Amazing! Click to find out more!
description:
A clickbait conspiracy thriller - in which you uncover a conspiracy that threatens the entire world, purely by clicking on clickbait.

Has clickbait become too powerful?

Will you be the one to destroy clickbait forever?...

Click the fullscreen button for best experience. Download file if you're having trouble playing in the browser, or want to play while offline.

Written by qualifiedbadger - Edited by SleepyAgents!
